game_description: Baboom Paradise is a locomotion based game and is funny to play. Play with friends and explore the world of Baboom paradise. There are many maps to choose from: -Ice -Forest -Backrooms -Horror -Sand -Shop -No Gravity Buy cosmetics so you can flex. There will be comming updates soon with new cosmetics and new mechanics.
